Reviews.Content: stayed jan 2012 booked priceline 52 east memphis terrible expect marriot chain check 2 minutes 1 bed cant imagine 2bed look probably incredibly crammed bathroom decent size bed comfy slept try backside hotel confusing entered parking lot enormous outlet mall located torn enter parking lot hotel wasnt single car concerned closed pull building front facing interstate gigantic flood lights parking lot front building front windows actually brighter lights night crafty furniture placement pin drapes shut light fitness joke eliptical treadmill tv size janitors closet cant sign posted option nearby gym free hotel guest didnt time indoor pool hot tub looked pretty inviting amenities wasnt bad breakfast free hot food doityourself waffles hotel love im fan breakfast sandwiches microwave cereal fruit mini muffins bagels yogurt etc internet free fine parking free obviously plentiful business center wasnt fan hotel location interstate exit doesnt near theres fast food nearby restaurants theres local college door access via road running parking lot flooded morning traffic 15 minutes parking lot due fast changing light intersection roundabout light fast terrible hotel gripes wasnt overly impressed id exactly pay

Reviews.Title: “Nice”

Reviews.Content: concerned getting hotel priceline reading reviews husband nine month son stayed nights beds comfy linens crisp clean advantage free breakfast consisted variety muffins yogurt english muffins variety cereals own waffles typical continental breakfast price paid price dirt cheap priceline half hotels exits town husband self defense instructor safety fanatic ok downside ceiling little thin occasionally hear walking floor staff

Reviews.Title: “The staff and the accommodations were great”
Reviews.Author: hatetotravel90
Reviews.Content: wife stayed 5 nights staff excellent marcus rob helpfull staff knowlegeable local attractions shop eat directions printouts attraction staff beyond usual customer friendly smile visit memphis truly memorable nice clean comfortable definely stay
